title: Old Video of Clashing UP Cops Shared as Fight Over ‘Bribe Money’
subtitle: UP Police Fight Viral video Fact Check: A video of two cops swinging their lathis (sticks) fiercely at each other is being shared on Facebook with a claim that the two fought over the distribution of ‘bribe money’.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
On searching with keywords ‘cops beating each other lathis’ we came across a news report published by Hindustan Times in 2013.

According to the daily, the two cops, identified as Mukund Chandra Yadav and Sunil Dixit, were on then Chief Minister Akhilesh Yadav’s duty at an entrepreneurs’ conference held at Indira Gandhi Pratishthan in Lucknow. The two fought after Dixit objected to Yadav’s absence from his point of duty.

According to another report by Headlines Today, the two cops were suspended and an enquiry was launched into the matter.
